# Suggested Commands

## Development
- `uv run spec-driver` - main CLI
- `uv run pytest supekku` - run tests
- `uv run ruff check --fix supekku` - lint
- `uv run ruff format supekku` - format
- `uv run pylint supekku` - pylint

## Just commands
- `just` or `just check` - format, lint, test, pylint (full check)
- `just test` - run pytest
- `just lint` - run ruff
- `just format` - run ruff format
- `just pylint` - run pylint
- `just quickcheck` - quick test then lint
